articles.author: Jorge Valero, Andrea Palasciano
articles.title: Draghi Says EU in Danger Without Massive Spending and Joint Debt - Bloomberg
articles.description: Former European Central Bank President Mario Draghi called on the EU to invest as much as €800 billion ($884 billion) extra a year and commit to the regular issuance of common bonds to make the bloc more competitive with China and the US.
